sentences.en: A choral concert will be given at the Municipal Arts Center.
sentences.cn: 在市艺术中心将有合唱音乐会.

sentences.en: Choral : Of or relating to a chorus or choir.
sentences.cn: 与合唱队或唱诗班有关的.

sentences.en: His collection of choral music from around the world is called 'Voices'.
sentences.cn: 他收录自世界各地的合唱音乐集取名为《声音》。

sentences.en: His collection of choral music from around the world is called "Voices".
sentences.cn: 他收录自世界各地的合唱音乐集取名为《声音》。

sentences.en: His works include operas, symphonic, choral and chamber music.
sentences.cn: 他的作品包括歌剧, 交响乐, 合唱和室内乐.

sentences.en: It is the very opposite of choral music.
sentences.cn: 它与合唱音乐正好相反.

sentences.en: Mendelssohn was a child prodigy and prolific composer. Almost one - fourth of his works was choral.
sentences.cn: 孟德尔逊不止天才横溢,更是多产作家,而当中接近四分之一均为合唱作品.

sentences.en: Peiyang Chorus got two prizes in the 2 nd Busan International Choral Festival & Competition .
sentences.cn: 北洋 合唱团在第2届釜山国际合唱节拿到了两个大奖.

sentences.en: The choral society sang the new cantata composed by its leader.
sentences.cn: 该合唱队演唱了他们领队编写的大合唱.

sentences.en: The founders of Chinese choral music in the 20 th century were Xiao Youmei and Zhao Yuanren.
sentences.cn: 20世纪中国合唱创作的开山祖,当推萧友梅、赵元任两位.

sentences.en: This is choral music of the first water.
Today, over 4,500 boys and girls receive choral , instrumental , dancing, arts craft training from the Choir.
sentences.cn: 今天, [香儿]拥有超过4,500名小成员,训练课程包括合唱 、 舞蹈 、 器乐及美术等.

sentences.en: We will sing our choral songs of gratitude and rejoice to the end of our pilgrimage.
sentences.cn: 我们将同声歌唱,感谢神灵,欢欣鼓舞直到走完人生旅程.

trans.tran_cn: 合唱队的，合唱的，圣诗队的
trans.tran_en: related to music that is sung by a large group of people together
